root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 3-b-1, translated into en
root.data: The field typist, together with the team controller, reviewed the questionnaires and then typed them in the Census and Survey Process (CsPro) version 4.1.002, special edition. This process of typing in the field allowed the detection of inconsistencies or omissions in the questionnaires, as well as the correction of them even on the ground, with the presence of the team in the conglomerate.
